alert.note: Alert for Desha; Drew; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 8:43PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Desha, northern Drew and south central Lincoln Counties through 930 PM CST... At 842 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wilmar, or 6 miles west of Monticello, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello... Dumas... Wilmar... Tillar... Winchester... Green Hill... Omega... Mills... Garrett Bridge... New Hope in Drew County... Gourd... Florence... Tyro... Selma... Yukon... Montongo... Coleman... Pickens in Desha County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for southeastern Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 200 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas.
